name: Outbreak Control
description:
Outbreak Control

There has been a viral outbreak in the city and you need to protect the people from the infectious disease. Click on the people marked red to stop the spread and buy vaccinations and doctors to help protect your people. Keep your city alive.

Keep your city alive.
  • Move camera with the right mouse button (scroll for zoom)
  • Red dots are infected people
  • White are healthy but will get exposed if close to red ones
  • You can quarantine infected people by left clicking them or using power-ups
  • Doctors will heal few infected people in the close range and then get infected themselves
  •  Vaccines will make people immune for a while
